title: Sabrina Carpenter, Selena Gomez and Andrew Garfield Honored by Anthem Awards (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: Sabrina Carpenter, Selena Gomez and Andrew Garfield are being honored by the 5th annual Anthem Awards, presented by the Webby Awards. The awards recognizes social impact leaders sparking positive change around the world. Carpenter, Gomez and Garfield are each being recognized with the Gold Anthem Aâ€¦
